title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 878.2 - Designated waters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 878.2 - Designated waters

State Regulations

The designated waters are located in the East Canada

Creek drainage basin, a portion of the Mohawk River drainage basin, as outlined
on map 1, section
878.7, infra, excluding the waters
contained within boundaries of State-owned forest preserve lands, and as
contained within the topographical limit line shown on the reproduced
topographical reference maps in section
878.9, infra, herein. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
878.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
